title: The camera should rise whenever Vel'Koz uses his R
body:
Hello!
[](https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6CdRaLbP0UY/WahhQ3mLvFI/AAAAAAABEwk/o0zJTSuZP1cDWwc_qNb3R8XR2Xg0KaFEACLcBGAs/s1600/c39d940d9e65f7ea.png)
This would be very useful in various angles,

https://imgur.com/cRUDrnu

https://imgur.com/y9rgWI9

https://imgur.com/cbBeGFS

It is usually out of screen :s


Like {{champion:202}} or {{champion:142}} 

Thanks!

[Original post](https://boards.las.leagueoflegends.com/es/c/jugabilidad-balance-y-narrativa/7Bgzlyft-petician-la-caamara-deberaua-de-elevarse-cuando-velkoz-use-su-r)

replies.body: This would be a nice qol change. Deserves upvotes.
As a vel koz player I would rather not have anything change for it, I don't play locked in screen so it's not a problem for myself.

I main Vel
Honestly, it would be a ***nice*** change, but I just don't want vel to be getting any attention (it turns out poorly for most champions)

> [{quoted}](name=Cantrip,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tFPRb2AT,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-12-29T17:09:01.986+0000)
>
> I main Vel
> Honestly, it would be a ***nice*** change, but I just don't want vel to be getting any attention (it turns out poorly for most champions)

I like being in control of my screen, that's all. If I want to see the end of the lazer I move the screen, if I don't think  I need to see the end of it then I look elseware while it's firing.

I finally got used to the jhin ulti but it's the least favorite mechanic I've played, anything that removes my control just gets under my skin.
0 attention after his release until the MYMU...then they trashed him for a few patches before basically putting him back to how he was before the update.

The problem is you use the cursor to control the camera **and** the ult vector. As a Vel’koz main haven’t you ever been in situations where you had to ult before you moved the camera? I know I have and it’s painful when the enemy walks off screen and you have to decided whether or not it is worth it to move the camera because you might miss a tic of damage on the ult if you do.

> [{quoted}](name=Raven Redeemed,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tFPRb2AT,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-12-29T21:29:25.669+0000)
>
> The problem is you use the cursor to control the camera **and** the ult vector. As a Vel’koz main haven’t you ever been in situations where you had to ult before you moved the camera? I know I have and it’s painful when the enemy walks off screen and you have to decided whether or not it is worth it to move the camera because you might miss a tic of damage on the ult if you do.

with unlocked screen I could look ahead to see where I need to fire and I usually keep vel off the screen while looking ahead and where it's firing. If I need to return to my champion at all a simple push of the space bar recenters the screen.

majority of the time I fire the ulti within E knock up range for the E-w-q-w-r combo, I fire the ulti outside of the combo range when I know some one else is initiating and keeping people occupied.

I know what works for me doesn't work for every one, but personally I play him the way he is just fine.

Gotcha. I feel like I sometimes have to react so quick (during a surprise fight) that I don’t have time to set up the camera, but maybe if I truely mained him it would become muscle memory and easy enough to do.

> [{quoted}](name=Raven Redeemed,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tFPRb2AT,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2017-12-30T01:26:05.845+0000)
>
> Gotcha. I feel like I sometimes have to react so quick (during a surprise fight) that I don’t have time to set up the camera, but maybe if I truely mained him it would become muscle memory and easy enough to do.

I just am burnt when it comes to "quality of life" adjustments. Yasuo on initial release, his Q nado functioned differently than it does now. You used to have to aim it and fire instead of just press q and it auto fires.

I preferred the original yasuo Q to the point I stopped playing him after the change.

Taliyah knock up was also changed for "quality of life" adjustments and I don't really like how it functions now compared to before when I had no problems with it before, I still try to play taliyah from time to time but I don't "enjoy" playing her anymore.

Velkoz is a champion I actually like playing so if history repeats itself any future changes I probably will not like.
I agree. This would be pretty useful. It's very similar to Jhin's ult so I can see how this would be useful. <3
Hell no. That would be awful. Can't stand playing jhin for that reason. Would ruin the champ for me and take away one of my main mid laners.

> [{quoted}](name=Prozzak,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tFPRb2AT,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-12-29T18:10:43.176+0000)
>
> Hell no. That would be awful. Can't stand playing jhin for that reason. Would ruin the champ for me and take away one of my main mid laners.

so seeing the screen makes it bad?
The awkward zoom out? Yeah, yeah it does. I know full where what I am doing without some weird unneeded zoom out occurring when I ult.
never played vel'koz but seems razonable, tke my upvote

I know people are thinking: "Well play in unlocked screen, duh!" Here's the issue. To MOVE the unlocked screen I must move my mouse and doing that in my ult will move the beam. Because of this, 3/10 or so of all my vel ult kills are done BLIND or by the map. PLEASE add this change!
You do realize that when Jhin was released they looked into doing this for Vel and it was terrible. It made it worse actually. That's why it wasn't done.
I completely agree!!

Yeah I mean it would be nice, but as stated in the past Vel'koz is one of those surprisingly balanced champions that most of us would prefer just remains untouched even for stuff like this.

He has to actually hit skill shots, is relevant when he does, but is immobile and yet a good team fighter.

Let Vel'koz be Vel'koz I say.
they mentioned trying to do this around when jhin was released but for some reason it didn't work.
Not yasuo doesn't sell skins he's never getting buffs even qol ones

Yeah It would be very useful 
But riot are busy with the upcoming vayne draven buffs and 900 RP leaver buster immunity
